Articles.Content:
People voted for an SSTO so that's what was created! Had no idea how to build one before so practiced and practiced during my free time. So many retakes as BD Armory AI is so good it killed me within 10 seconds in most attempts. Hope you like the final product. (Also bought a new mic for this, hopefully it sounds better for everyone). Please feel free to throw ideas at me for future episodes!

Hi all,

I'm working on a series of videos revolving around a war that has started on Kerbin. Currently the war is small and localized but will slowly spread around the globe. I'm currently using BD Armory as the main mod for the videos and would love to hear some of your opinions on how to proceed. Please take a look at the playlist below and tell me what you think.
